statements: SELECT * FROM leadership_communication_records;
SELECT id, message, sender, receiver, date_sent FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE effectiveness_rating > 3;
SELECT message, sender, receiver FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE date_sent >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender, receiver, effectiveness_rating FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE sender='Alice' ORDER BY date_sent DESC;
SELECT id, message, sender, receiver, effectiveness_rating FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE sender='Bob' AND receiver='Charlie';
SELECT * FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE sender = 'John Doe' ORDER BY date_sent DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message, sender, receiver FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE date_sent > '2022-05-01' AND effectiveness_rating > 3 ORDER BY date_sent ASC;
SELECT id, sender, receiver, effectiveness_rating FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE sender LIKE '%Doe%' OR receiver = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY id;
SELECT message, sender, date_sent FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE effectiveness_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY sender, date_sent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM leadership_communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice Jones' AND receiver = 'Bob Smith' AND date_sent > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY date_sent DESC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_messages;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM leadership_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, timestamp, message_text FROM leadership_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM leadership_messages WHERE receiver_id = 3;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, timestamp FROM leadership_messages WHERE sender_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM leadership_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, timestamp, message_text FROM leadership_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY message_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT leadership_messages.message_id, leadership_messages.sender_id, message_text, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM leadership_messages JOIN message_feedback ON leadership_messages.message_id = message_feedback.message_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM leadership_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ORDER BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT * FROM message_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND feedback_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM leadership_messages LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM leadership_messages WHERE sent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, message_id, feedback_text FROM message_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT message_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM message_metrics WHERE open_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM message_feedback JOIN leadership_messages ON message_feedback.message_id = leadership_messages.message_id WHERE feedback_id <= 100;
SELECT * FROM message_metrics ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, open_rate ASC
SELECT message_text, sent_date FROM leadership_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM leadership_messages WHERE message_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT metric_id, message_id, open_rate*100 AS open_rate_percentage FROM message_metrics WHERE open_rate > 0.1
SELECT * FROM message_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM leadership_communication;
SELECT message, sender_id, receiver_id FROM leadership_communication WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM leadership_communication GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT sender_id, MAX(sent_timestamp) AS latest_sent_message FROM leadership_communication GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' AND position = 'Manager';
SELECT message_feedback.rating, message_feedback.feedback, employees.name FROM message_feedback JOIN employees ON message_feedback.sender_id = employees.id WHERE message_feedback.rating >= 4;
SELECT DISTINCT channel_name, channel_type FROM communication_channels ORDER BY channel_name;

SELECT leadership_communication.message, employees.name AS sender, sender_employee.name AS receiver FROM leadership_communication JOIN employees ON leadership_communication.sender_id = employees.id JOIN employees AS sender_employee ON leadership_communication.receiver_id = sender_employee.id;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT communication_id, message FROM communication_records WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_name, department FROM sender WHERE sender_id = 3;
SELECT email, role FROM receiver WHERE receiver_id = 10;
SELECT group_name, description FROM communication_groups WHERE group_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT sender_name, department FROM sender ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT receiver_name, email, role FROM receiver WHERE role = 'Manager'
SELECT communication_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT cr.* FROM communication_records cr JOIN sender s ON cr.sender_id = s.sender_id WHERE s.department = 'Marketing'
